descriptions.lead: Take ownership of various Mastercard Payment Gateway Services assets, APIs, and Javascript SDKs.
details: Heavily involved in various projects and led in the development, planning, and maintenance of the Javascript SDK code bases.
Maintain proper version control following Semantic Versioning (Semver) best practices and ensuring that latest, plus one version before is always maintained and supported.
Code quality is enforced by applying Standard JS linting and formatting, along with constant proper code reviews and pair programming ensuring top quality code to be shipped consistently.
Use Typescript to maintain and organize clear and concise methods for merchants to implement it into thei online shopping platform.
Develop and maintain codebases to integrate with the backend solution architecture using a series of Java flow services to retrieve various information to the client.
Develop RESTful APIs, controllers, and services to be integrated into the front-end Typescript and Javascript applications.

projects: Standardized and develop a base API code for all other JS SDKs
Modernizing and future proofing of legacy platforms
Rewrite legacy platform with modern Typescript and Angular framework

descriptions.lead: Leading a team of Engineers to develop and maintain the software of Azqore that is used for bankers and corporate clients.
details: Leading, building, and maintaining different projects and codebases that will be used by other developers.
Organize, maintain, and develop clean and proper version control that is being used by different groups of engineers working simultaneously in different timezones.
Ensure code quality using JSLint, peer to peer code reviews and pair programming, and also ensure best practices are followed.
Use Angular5 to organize, display, sort big data from the database.
Develop and maintain codebases to integrate with the backend solution architecture using a series of Java flow services to retrieve various information to the client.
Develop RESTful APIs, controllers, and services to be integrated into the front-end Angular application.

projects: Build and maintain front-end libraries used in the Azqore S2I platform
Make UI/UX improvements based on user stories and feedback
Improve build script efficiency to improve build time
